description:
Beer sales on which tax was paid

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
73421 Beer tax statistics

Definition:
The tax arises by beer being removed from the tax warehouse,
without any tax suspension procedure being initiated
subsequently. Tax warehouses are the beer producing
establishments (also referred to as breweries) and beer
storing establishments.
The sales of beer from tax warehouses may include
own-account production of the breweries, purchases from
within Germany and from other EU Member States, and imports
from third countries.
